from nbdev.showdoc import *
%reload_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2
%matplotlib inline

import FLIR_pubsub.multi_pyspin as multi_pyspin
import imutils
from matplotlib.pyplot import imshow

from  FLIR_pubsub import FLIR_server_utils
FLIR_server_utils.register()  

from pathlib import Path

# yaml_dir= Path.cwd()/'common'
# yaml_dicts = []
# for i, serial in enumerate(list(multi_pyspin.SERIAL_DICT)):
#     print(f'{yaml_dir/serial}.yaml')
#     yaml_dict = multi_pyspin.setup(f'{yaml_dir/serial}.yaml')
#     yaml_dicts.append(yaml_dict)

SERIAL_DICT = multi_pyspin.SERIAL_DICT
serial = list(SERIAL_DICT.keys())[0]
multi_pyspin.init(serial)
multi_pyspin.start_acquisition(serial)
    
image, image_dict = multi_pyspin.get_image(serial)
img = image.GetNDArray()
shape = img.shape

multi_pyspin.end_acquisition(serial)
multi_pyspin.deinit(serial)

img = imutils.resize(img, width=1000, height=750)
imshow(img, cmap='gray')

Camera focus¶

Camera Calibration¶

Goal In this section,
We will learn about distortions in camera, intrinsic and extrinsic parameters of camera etc.
We will learn to find these parameters, undistort images etc.
Basics
https://opencv-python-tutroals.readthedocs.io/en/latest/py_tutorials/py_calib3d/py_calibration/py_calibration.html#calibration
